channel.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
channel.description: yeah i kinda want an ::xteleall command please and ty!? I would rep if i could :(

item.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Yah I made this based off of my staffmeeting command which teles all staff to the staffzone.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?

item.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

but from that you could make

if(command.equals("stafftome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights >= 1) { castOn.toX = absX; castOn.toY = absY; castOn.heightLevel = heightLevel; castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; castOn.sM( "You have been teleported to " + playerName); } } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?

item.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“bbl111, post:4, topic:271964”]Here’s a more advanced 1 if you want it

if(command.equals("xteleall") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights >= 0) { castOn.toX = absX; castOn.toY = absY; castOn.heightLevel = heightLevel; castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; castOn.sM( "You have been teleported to " + playerName); } } } }[/quote]
That command completes the same function, and it uses more space.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?

item.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Here’s a more advanced 1 if you want it

if(command.equals("xteleall") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client if(castOn.playerRights >= 0) { castOn.toX = absX; castOn.toY = absY; castOn.heightLevel = heightLevel; castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; castOn.sM( "You have been teleported to " + playerName); } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Just a real fast ? can someone give me a ::xteletall command?
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

if (command.equals("alltome") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function client castOn = (client) p; // specific player's client p.toX = absX; p.toY = absY; } } }
